name: Refurbished GameBoy Color - Teal
description: This refurbished Game Boy Color in a classic teal color has been upgraded with modern enhancements to elevate your gaming experience. Featuring a vibrant, newly installed backlit screen for improved visibility, it also boasts an upgraded sound system for richer, clearer audio. The Game Boy logo on the front has been customized with a touch screen color change for a unique, eye-catching effect. Perfect for collectors or anyone looking to relive their childhood gaming moments with a fresh twist.

name: Refurbished GameBoy Color - White
description: This refurbished Game Boy Color in sleek white has been upgraded with modern features to enhance your gaming experience. It now includes a bright, newly installed backlit screen for better visibility in any lighting. The audio system has also been upgraded for a richer and clearer sound, ensuring a more immersive play. Plus, the iconic Game Boy logo has been customized with a touch screen color change, adding a unique, stylish flair. Whether you're a collector or a nostalgic gamer, this revamped system brings a fresh twist to a classic favorite.
